div.p: The CanonicalResource represents resources that have a canonical URL:

ul.li: They have a canonical URL (note: all resources with a canonical URL are specializations of this type)
They have version, status, and data properties to help manage their publication
They carry some additional metadata about their use, including copyright information

div.p: As an interface, this type is never created directly - see Resource Interfaces for more details.

div.div:
Boundaries and Relationships
This interface extends the base DomainResource. The following resources implement this interface:
[%canonical-resources%]
